column3: Traffic;Koh Kong:------ A truck has hit a house
column4: killing one child after the building collapsed.  The incident occurred in Mondul Seima district
column5: Koh Kong province at 9:30 am on August 25
column6: 2019.------ UPDATE: The incident resulted in serious injuries to one male and two deaths (1 female). ------The driver  was identified as 30-year-old On Sokny
column7: (seriously injured). The first victim was Sorn Sokha
column11: a 2-and-a-half-year-old boy (both deceased).------Police are now investigating the cause.------ Arey News
